CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK( Krow__Billable_Amount_Logged__c ), IF(Krow__Billable_Amount_Logged__c = 0, TRUE, FALSE)), 0, (Krow__Billable_Amount_Logged__c - (Krow__Billable_Cost_Amount_Logged__c + Krow__Expense_Cost__c)) / Krow__Billable_Amount_Logged__c )
CustomField.label: Margin % (Logged)
